title.rendered: New Color Offerings From Eldorado Stone® Expand Design Possibilities

content.rendered:
Selecting the right stone and color can make the difference between an ordinary project and a true showcase. Whether it is a deep charcoal that offsets the emerald green of the Pacific Northwest or gentle earth tones, which highlight the myriad shades of a desert sunset, Eldorado Stone® offers the world’s most authentic architectural stone veneer in hues that make an impression. In the continual pursuit of authentic and impactful product offerings, Eldorado Stone® has released six new colors across its national and regional stone profiles.

The nationally available Cypress Ridge profile remains popular for its irregularity and organic look. Check out the downloadable press release for detailed descriptions of the new colors!

 

Download Press Release
